author: daniellehrner
content: I think in the past EIPs without champion never made it into a hardfork. There are sometimes rescopings of the forks and a champion is needed to push back against the removal of their EIP. With no champion present, there is no pushback and the EIP just gets taken out, having wasted time of the teams that worked on it already. This has happened as recetly as Fusaka.
